meanings.definition: Hadrosaurs: a group of herbivorous dinosaurs known for their duck-billed appearance.
meanings.sent1: The hadrosaurs roamed the ancient lands peacefully, munching on plants.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study hadrosaurs to learn more about prehistoric life.
meanings.sent3: The hadrosaurs threw a party in the jungle, inviting all their dinosaur friends.
meanings.sent4: In the children's book, the hadrosaurs were depicted as friendly creatures with big smiles.
meanings.sent5: The museum exhibit showcased a life-sized model of a hadrosaur, captivating visitors with its size and shape.

meanings.definition: Hadrosaurs: past tense of the verb 'have', used to indicate possession or ownership.
meanings.sent1: Yesterday, I hadrosaurs a new toy that I really wanted.
meanings.sent2: She hadrosaurs a collection of rare stamps from around the world.
meanings.sent3: The magician hadrosaurs a magical wand that could make anything disappear.
meanings.sent4: His love for music hadrosaurs him a vast collection of vinyl records.
meanings.sent5: The old house hadrosaurs a mysterious past that intrigued the neighborhood kids.
